actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Yellowstone National Park, Idaho, Wyo., Mont., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Yellowstone National Park in Idaho, Montana, and Wyoming, as wilderness, to be administered by the Secretary of the Interior. Authorizes the Secretary to permit specified uses of land within the wilderness areas.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Yellowstone National Park, Idaho, Wyo., Mont., as wilderness.
